## Protocol.SystemInfo.ImageDecodeAcceleratorCapability.subsamplings property

Optional array of supported subsampling formats, e.g. 4:2:0, if known.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subsamplings: SubsamplingFormat[];
```
